August 4th 1907 quote seven verses which
are distributed over the seven days of
the week they are practiced as follows
on Friday one meditates on the verse for
Saturday on Saturday the verse for
Sunday etc you can do this several times
during the day and spend twenty to
thirty minutes trying to plumb the
depths of such a verse through this you
will make much progress in achieving a
relationship to the mystery of the all
permeating Sevenfold mmus close quote
